That sounds like a great idea! A custom-made necklace with a Scorpio charm would be a unique and personalized piece that reflects your personality and style. Scorpios are known for their intensity and passion, so a bold and striking design would be fitting.

It's great to hear that you recently got your grandmother's pearl earrings resized. Updating old pieces can breathe new life into them and make them wearable again. It's also a great way to hold onto sentimental value and family heirlooms. February 20th must have been a special day for you, getting to revive a piece of your grandmother's jewelry.

When it comes to designing your Scorpio necklace, you might consider incorporating elements that resonate with the sign's symbolism, such as:

1. Scorpion motifs: A stylized scorpion charm or pendant would be a bold and eye-catching representation of your sign.
2. Dark, rich colors: Scorpios are often associated with intense, mysterious colors like black, red, and purple. Consider incorporating these hues into your necklace design.
3. Geometric patterns: Scorpios are known for their analytical nature, so geometric patterns like chevrons or hexagons could add a touch of sophistication to your design.
4. Water-inspired elements: As a water sign, Scorpios are connected to the emotional and intuitive realms. You might consider incorporating elements like waves, ripples, or droplets into your design.

Remember to choose a design that speaks to you and your personal style. A custom-made piece should reflect your unique personality and aesthetic. Good luck, and I hope you'll love your new Scorpio necklace!
